mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_CODE , A.ENT_CODE , A.USER_ID , A.USER_EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_NAME , A.BIRTH_DATE , A.GENDER , A.DEPOSIT , A.LAST_LOGIN , A.ENROLL_DATE FROM "USER" A

SELECT B.USER_NUM , B.USER_CODE , B.ENT_CODE , B.USER_ID , B.USER_EMAIL , B.PHONE , B.USER_NAME , B.BIRTH_DATE , B.GENDER , B.DEPOSIT , B.LAST_LOGIN , B.ENROLL_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.USER_CODE DESC ) AS USER_NUM , A.USER_CODE , A.ENT_CODE , A.USER_ID , A.USER_EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_NAME , A.BIRTH_DATE , A.GENDER , A.DEPOSIT , A.LAST_LOGIN , A.ENROLL_DATE FROM "USER" A) B
SELECT A.USER_ID FROM "USER" A WHERE LOWER(A.USER_NAME) = LOWER(#{ name }) AND A.USER_EMAIL = #{ email }

SELECT A.USER_CODE , A.ENT_CODE , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PSW , A.USER_EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_NAME , A.BIRTH_DATE , A.GENDER , A.AUTHORITY , A.DEPOSIT , A.PROFILE_ORIG_NAME , A.PROFILE_UUID_NAME , A.PROFILE_IMG_PATH , A.LAST_LOGIN , A.ENROLL_DATE FROM "USER" A WHERE A.USER_CODE = #{ code }
SELECT A.USER_PSW FROM "USER" A WHERE A.ENT_CODE = '1' AND A.USER_ID = #{ id }

SELECT A.USER_CODE , A.ENT_CODE , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PSW , A.USER_EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.USER_NAME , A.BIRTH_DATE , A.GENDER , A.AUTHORITY , A.DEPOSIT , A.PROFILE_ORIG_NAME , A.PROFILE_UUID_NAME , A.PROFILE_IMG_PATH , A.LAST_LOGIN , A.ENROLL_DATE FROM "USER" A WHERE A.ENT_CODE = '1' AND A.USER_ID = #{ id }
